text: John Stewart (1784–1873), of Belladrum, Inverness was a British politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of the United Kingdom for Beverley 1826–1830. ==References== Category:1784 births Category:1873 deaths Category:People from Inverness Category:Members of the Parliament of the United Kingdom for English constituencies Category:UK MPs 1826–1830
title: John Stewart (1784–1873)
